channel.title: Education on Code Embers
channel.description: Recent content in Education on Code Embers

item.title: Ep 2, On FHIR
item.description: In this Code Embers health informatics podcast, we discuss the Microsoft acquisition of Nuance. We cover some classification standards such as Health Level 7速's Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources速 (FHIR速) and the US Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI), with a larger focus on FHIR速. We also explain “The Curly Braces Problem” and how that relates to informatics.

item.title: Ep 1, Koi Ponds
item.description: KOI Ponds - Introduction to the Code Embers health informatics podcast, including discussions on the KOI Pond, on the value of the physician informatician, and jankiness scales.
